actions.text: SA 2749 fell when first degree amendment SA 2748 was tabled.

Amendment SA 2749 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2748. (consideration: CR S884) To provide a new system by which to resolve claims for bodily injury caused by asbestos exposure, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2749 proposed by Senator Cornyn to Amendment SA 2748.

amends_amendment.purpose: To provide a new system by which to resolve claims for bodily injury caused by asbestos exposure, and for other purposes.

purpose: To provide a new system by which to resolve claims for bodily injury caused by asbestos exposure, and for other purposes.
